verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The sun is always shining,
It shines above on a stormy day,
Even in the darkest night time,
It's just the world that's turned away.
So if you keep your praises climbing,
You'll find light above the storm,
Don't curse the night, it's in God's timing.
Trust, endure until the morn.

verse.name: v2
